name: RGB Dungeon (Danial Jumagaliyev)
description:
If you want more beautiful graphics, feel free to download the Windows version down below!

READ THE CONTROLS AND THE INSTRUCTIONS: ControlsKey bindingsMovementA & D keysStart game or JumpSpace keyAttackW key or LMB (Left Mouse Button)Place SwordS key or RMB (Right Mouse Button)RestartR key

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Enemies will slowly start to approach from both sides of the map.
  • Recolour your sword to match the enemies' colour and hit them.
  • After each wave you get a sword that you can place around the map. The swords automatically pop in and out from the ground and can attack enemies for you.

Made for the Friday Night Game Jam 2020-35 in 3 hours (that was stressful).

Change the colour of your sword according to the enemies' colours and smack them!
